channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 10:44 Repulse of the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🟢 10:44 Repulse of the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Stay tuned for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 10:43 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovsk territorial community. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 10:43 Repulse threat of artillery shelling in Pokrovsk territorial community. item.title: 🟠 10:00 FREE EVACUATIONWe ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for evacuation of the civilian population – 0800339291
